loading.message1: Remember, as you level up, your damage, spell damage, mana, and mana regeneration also increase, making it easier for you to defeat bosses. To level up, you can play timer, challenger, and boss modes.
loading.message2: Your data is saved on your device, don't forget to synchronize it from the profile menu to avoid losing your data.
loading.message3: Mistakes Happen, We're Here! If you've encountered an error or have suggestions to make our app better, please let us know. We can't improve without your feedback! We're Waiting for Your Feedback! Thank you.
loading.message4: Notice Anything Odd in Translations? While adapting our app to different languages, translation errors can sometimes occur. If you spot any mistake or come across terms that need correction, please don't hesitate to let us know.

commonGeneral.bestScoreByKill: Your best score by kill time

snackbarMessages.errorSubmitScore2: To submit your score, you need to beat your previous score.
snackbarMessages.succesSubmitScore: Your score has been sent successfully.
snackbarMessages.feedbackInfoMessage: Your message must be at least 10 characters.
snackbarMessages.feedbackSuccessMessage: Thank you! your feedback will help me improve your experience.
snackbarMessages.qwerHudInfoMessage1: Adjusts the height of the quas, wex, exort, and invoke buttons.
snackbarMessages.qwerHudInfoMessage2: The higher it is, the closer it is to the bottom.

snackbarMessages.syncDataWait: You can perform synchronization every 5 minutes.

authErrorMessages.AuthWeakPassword: Password should be at least 6 characters.
authErrorMessages.AuthEmailAlreadyInUse: The email address is already in use by another account.
authErrorMessages.AuthToManyRequests: We have blocked all requests from this device due to unusual activity. Try again later.

feedback.fbMidText: Tell me how your experience was and let me know what I can improve.
feedback.fbHint: Drop me any suggestions, questions or complaints to improve :)

bossBattleInfo.note: Note: Each level increases the spell damage by 2%.
bossBattleInfo.outerCircleInfo: The outer circle represents the boss's health.
bossBattleInfo.middleCircleInfo: The middle circle represents the number of rounds.
bossBattleInfo.innerCircleInfo: The inner circle represents the passage of time.

exitGameDialogMessages.body1: Legendary Invoker! The master of earth-shaking spells! You say you're about to leave the game. However, does a wizard disappear suddenly? Do you really want to leave this world, putting aside the spells cast? Or shall we stay in a world filled with a bit more magical touch?
exitGameDialogMessages.word1: Rest, recover, but it's crucial not to stay away from the magic of the world!
exitGameDialogMessages.body2: You've created wonders as a hero on the battlefield, but now it's time to decide. Is the decision to leave the game really what you want? If so, there's an open door for you. However, if you want more victories and moments filled with war, you can leave that door and stay here.
exitGameDialogMessages.word2: Time can't be reversed, but the world is waiting for you!
exitGameDialogMessages.body3: You're standing in the midst of the battle, saying you're about to leave the battlefield. If you want to give up this tough struggle, you must choose your path. Remember, victory sometimes requires not giving up. Perhaps victory is just one step further ahead. What do you want to do?
exitGameDialogMessages.word3: Take a breath, but remember that the story of your victory is not yet complete!

appUpdateDialog.message: Invoker, get ready! A surprise update is waiting for you. Update now and discover what's new in our magical world. We've enhanced the gaming experience with brand-new features and changes. Tap the update button and join this enchanting adventure!

Null_talisman.bonus: Increases mana by +60 and +0.8 mana regeneration

Veil_of_discord.bonus:
Increases magic damage taken by bosses.
Duration: 16 seconds

Kaya.bonus: Mana regen amp +24% and spell amp +8%

Hand_of_midas.bonus:
Gives 360 gold at the end of each round.
(Multiple items won't work!)

Meteor_hammer.bonus:
+2.75 mana regeneration
Duration: 6 seconds
Deals damage to bosses over time.

Ethereal_blade.bonus:
+400 Mana with mana regen amp +72% and spell amp +16%
Duration: 8 Seconds
(This item can be purchased only once!)

Refresher_orb.active:
Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.
(Multiple items won't stacks)

Dagon.bonus:
Energy Burst
(This item can be purchased only once!)

Aghanims_scepter.bonus:
Doubles Sun Strike damage, adds +400 mana, +10 damage, and also adds 3 levels to all abilities.
(Can be purchased once, takes no inventory space, and is non-refundable.)

Aghanims_shard.bonus:
EMP restores 225 mana.
Ghost Walk ability regenerates 10 mana per second for 15 seconds when no other ability or item is used.
(Can be purchased once, takes no inventory space, and is non-refundable.)
